thread.section_title: The NoMad Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Elegant and Wonderful
thread.title_full: Elegant and Wonderful - Review of The NoMad Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Manuela3
title: Elegant and Wonderful
text: What an elegant and friendly hotel to stay in! Everyone was very helpful from the valet to the front desk. The room was extremely comfortable, quiet and plush on the third floor. We went to the Dan White magic show in the hotel and it was very entertaining. The library bar is a wonderfully relaxing and beautiful bar and much quieter than the back bar in the hotel, so we could talk about how great the magic show was! The NoMad is convenient to many other restaurants in the area and also the Sex Museum. Stay here if you can!
